location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Captain Trounce, Commander of the Ketch

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Captain of the Ketchthat the Resident has received a report from Captain Matson, Commander of the Moholar, that his ship was pursued by pirates while en route from Bombay. It is recommended that the Ketchremains at Bushire until the arrival of the HCC Ternate, which can provide escort.
